An additional 2 to 4 inches is possible. * WHERE...Upper Wind River Basin. * WHEN...Snow will be light tonight, with chances increasing

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:06PM MST until January 06 at 5:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the mountains and 1-4 inches in the Bear River Valley and Uinta County, Wyoming. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. In Utah, Wasatch
